item.title: How We Contribute To Homebrew
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Homebrew Homebrew (or brew) is one of the biggest repo on Github with more than 29k stars, 14k forks and 1k watches. It was started by Max Howell in 2009 to build the missing package manager for OS X. Back to before 2009, in Mac OSX, if we wanted to install something, we had to install it via pkg files or bin files. We didn’t have anything fancy like apt-get in Ubuntu or yum in Fedora.
